span.strong: The School District of the Chathams is currently closed as per Governor Murphy's Executive Order #104. Distance learning is in effect for students, and all school buildings and fields are closed to the public. Thank you.

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 Closure

span.span: The School District of the Chathams is currently accepting letters from Chatham resident families interested in having their 3- and 4-year-olds attend our Chatham Inclusion Preschool (CHIP) Program. For more details, click here.
